text: Won si n bi o leere nipa nnkan osu (obinrin). So pe: “Inira ni (sisunmo won lasiko naa). Nitori naa, e yera fun awon obinrin l’asiko nnkan osu. E ma se sunmo won (fun oorun ife) titi won yo fi se imora. Ti won ba si ti se imora, e sunmo won ni aye ti Allahu pa lase fun yin. Dajudaju Allahu nifee awon oluronu-piwada. O si nifee awon olumora
